markdownRemark.html:
XMPP Jargons

C2S

Client to Server The client can be any medium such as mobile, web or any application that knows to talk in XMPP protocol Wrapping up the part one with this tip! Stay tuned for more detailed posts about how to configure, deploy or develop a XMPP server.
